title: bhajana sEyu margamunu
sahitya:
bhajana sEyu mAgamunu jUpavE parama bhAgavata bhAgadEya sad
(bhajana)

anupallavi

ajuDu rudrudAkhaNDala pavanaja vijayAdulu gumigUDi nIdu
caraNa
(bhajana)

caraNam

sakala vEda shAstra purANa dIpa sakala mantra tantra rUpa
sItApati
sakala dEva ripu samara pratApa sAdhu tyAgarAjanuta rAma nija
(bhajana)
